item.title: Nucl. physics II
item.description: Nuclear physics II (E) - Nucl. physics II Course Nuclear physics II (E) Course No. Nucl. physics II Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture English 3 5 WT Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Nuclear Physics I, Quantum Mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Part of the obligatory courses for area of specialisation Nuclear and Particle Physics, separate oral examination is possible exceptionally.
